title: Julia's Hot Cross Buns
ingredients: ['90ml milk', '90ml water', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons butter or margarine', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon orange zest', '400g bread flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '80g sultanas (optional)', '100g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon water']
